thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Michele McKeown
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by Michele McKeown

author: Michele McKeown
title: Michele McKeown
text:
Called about a broken cord on a 10 year old blind. Angela Balles was more than helpful, having the part sent and providing instructions on replacing it. Fixing it was easy-breezy, so no need to replace an otherwise perfectly working blind.
I've purchased all our blinds from Smith & Noble for our last 3 houses, and wouldn't go anywhere else!
